document.docAuthor: Petrescu, Iorgu, Chatterjee, Tapas & Schizas, Nikolaos V.
document.masterDocTitle: Three new Nannastacidae (Crustacea: Cumacea) species from a Caribbean mesophotic ecosystem

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Three new Nannastacidae (Crustacea: Cumacea) species from a Caribbean mesophotic ecosystem

heading.emphasis:
Key to species of
Cumella
genus from Western Atlantic (northern part)

subSubSection.paragraph: A number of 38 species were known from the northern part of Western Atlantic Ocean. For 33 species are known the female or both sexes.

paragraph.keyLead:
2 . Two dorsal row of spines on carapace..................................................
biserrata
Petrescu, 2002

3 . Carapace with spines and tubercles.....................................................
ruetzleri
Petrescu, 2002

6 . Uropodal peduncle twice 6 th pleonite length..............................
longicaudata
Petrescu, Iliffe & Sarbu, 1994
- Uropodal peduncle shorter than twice 6 th pleonite length...................................................... 7

9 . Carapace with 12 dorsal spines.................................................
spinifera
Petrescu & Heard , 2004

10 . Uropodal peduncle shorter than 6 th pleonite..............................
jamaicensis
Petrescu, Iliffe & Sarbu, 1994

- Uropodal endopod with 2 medial setae................................. pagani
Petrescu, Chatterjee & Schizas, 2014

12 . Carapace with 5 dorsal spines.............................................
medeeae
Petrescu, Iliffe & Sarbu, 1994

- Carapace with 4 dorsal spines..................................... manolelii
Petrescu, Chatterjee & Schizas, 2013

13 . Carapace with 3 dorsal spines..............................................
zimmeri
Petrescu, Iliffe & Sarbu, 1994

- Carapace with 1 dorsal spine................................................
antipai
Petrescu, Iliffe & Sarbu, 1994

- Uropodal peduncle glabrous........................................... gurui
Petrescu, Chatterjee & Schizas, 2014

- Carapace with 4 dorsal spines.................................... alexandrinae
Petrescu, Chatterjee & Schizas, 2012

18 . Ocular lobe with lenses placed in two longitudinal rows.......................................
pilosa
Băcescu, 1971

24 . Carapace with a dorsal longitudinal carina.............................................
abacoensis Petrescu, 1996

25 . Pereopod 5 with carpus times propodus length...................................
garrityi Băcescu & Muradian, 1977

26 . Pereopod 5 carpus times propodus length............................................
andri Petrescu & Iliffe, 1992

- Pereopod 5 carpus times propodus length.......................................
bahamensis Petrescu & Iliffe, 1992

28 . Uropodal endopod with 3 medial setae...........................................
bacescui Petrescu & Iliffe, 1992

- Uropodal endopod with 2 medial setae................................ solomoni
Petrescu, Chatterjee & Schizas, 2013

31 . Uropodal endopod with 2 medial setae...................................................
ocellata
Băcescu, 1992

- Uropodal endopod with 4 medial setae...................................................
hirsuta (
Hansen, 1895
)
